name: Zofia

biography.description: Zofia is equipped with the KS79 Lifeline, a device that fires both concussion and impact projectiles to disrupt enemies and breach surfaces.

gameplayTips: Use the concussion projectiles to disorient enemies before engaging.
Utilize the impact projectiles for quick breaching and creating sightlines.
Coordinate with teammates to maximize the disruption caused by the Lifeline.
